Divine Protection.quote: "The Lord is my rock, my fortress and my deliverer." (Psalm 18:2)

Sacred Refuge.quote: "Allah is the best protector, and He is the most merciful of the merciful." (Quran 12:64)

Spiritual Shield.quote: "The name of the Lord is a strong tower; the righteous run into it and are safe." (Proverbs 18:10)

Divine Shelter.quote: "Under His wings you will find refuge." (Psalm 91:4)

Celestial Guard.quote: "For he will command his angels concerning you to guard you in all your ways." (Psalm 91:11)

Sacred Defense.quote: "I will say of the Lord, He is my refuge and my fortress, my God, in whom I trust." (Psalm 91:2)

Divine Preservation.quote: "The Lord will keep you from all harm - he will watch over your life." (Psalm 121:7)

Eternal Security.quote: "No one can snatch them out of my Father's hand." (John 10:29)

Sacred Sanctuary.quote: "In the shadow of your wings I will take refuge." (Psalm 57:1)

Divine Armor.quote: "Put on the full armor of God." (Ephesians 6:11)

Spiritual Fortress.quote: "The Lord is good, a stronghold in the day of trouble." (Nahum 1:7)

Divine Guardian.quote: "I am with you and will watch over you wherever you go." (Genesis 28:15)

Sacred Shield.quote: "You are my hiding place; you will protect me from trouble." (Psalm 32:7)

Divine Covering.quote: "He will cover you with his feathers, and under his wings you will find refuge." (Psalm 91:4)

Eternal Watch.quote: "The Lord watches over youâ€”the Lord is your shade at your right hand." (Psalm 121:5)

Divine Defense.quote: "The Lord will fight for you; you need only to be still." (Exodus 14:14)

Sacred Protection.quote: "But you, Lord, are a shield around me." (Psalm 3:3)

Spiritual Security.quote: "The eternal God is your refuge, and underneath are the everlasting arms." (Deuteronomy 33:27)

Divine Care.quote: "Cast your cares on the Lord and he will sustain you." (Psalm 55:22)

Sacred Guardianship.quote: "I will never leave you nor forsake you." (Hebrews 13:5)

Divine Watch.quote: "The eyes of the Lord are on the righteous." (Psalm 34:15)

Eternal Protection.quote: "The Lord himself goes before you and will be with you." (Deuteronomy 31:8)

Sacred Cover.quote: "He is my shield and the horn of my salvation, my stronghold." (Psalm 18:2)

Divine Safeguard.quote: "The Lord will keep your going out and your coming in." (Psalm 121:8)

Spiritual Protection.quote: "God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble." (Psalm 46:1)

Divine Haven.quote: "In God I trust and am not afraid." (Psalm 56:11)

Sacred Refuge.quote: "The Lord's name is a strong tower; the righteous run to it and are safe." (Proverbs 18:10)

Divine Shelter.quote: "He who dwells in the shelter of the Most High will rest in the shadow of the Almighty." (Psalm 91:1)
